name: Google Maps and Distance Finder plugin
author: Aspire Solutions

sections.description:
Google Maps and Distance Finder lets you add an interactive google map to the wordpress site. On the contact page of your website you can now have a google map that will locate the user location and will calculate the distance between user location and your company/store.
The plugin also lets user change their location by entering their zip code.

Features
1. Google Maps and Distance Finder is based on the latest Google maps API v3
2. WordPress MultiSite compatible
3. Easy integration by using short code
4. Add custom marker images from WP backend for yoru store/company and user location
5. Site users can get exact distance with directions

Arbitrary section
sections.installation:
1.Login to your wordpress website

2.Goto Plugins >> Add New

3.Click Upload

4.Browse and Locate the googlemap_distance.zip file on your harddisk and click Install Now button.
